properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 1 at 4:01PM AKST until February 2 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage, AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of around 6
inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...Kodiak City.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to noon AKST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Higher winds and snowfall totals are
possible on the Island outside of Kodiak City. Rain will quickly
change to snow by the afternoon and temperatures are expected to
remain at or above freezing for the remainder of the week.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON AKST SUNDAY FOR KODIAK CITY
